sentences.english: I said yes agreeably , and hanged off.
sentences.chinese: 我欣然地說好的，然後就掛斷了。

sentences.english: Attempt to do me awake all the way, Xinxin Ran opened his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 一切都像剛睡醒的樣子，欣欣然張開了眼。

sentences.english: All look like the appearance which just awoke, joyfully opened joyful enlarged ones vision.
sentences.chinese: 一切都象剛睡醒的樣子，欣欣然張開了眼。

sentences.english: H : Well, she said yes agreeably . And travelling in Europe is her dream, too.
sentences.chinese: 是啊，她欣然同意了，再說去歐洲旅行也是她的夢想。

sentences.english: When to see the earth, everything for it and pleased by the return.
sentences.chinese: 當俯瞰大地時，一切，爲之欣然所歸。

sentences.english: Jiang Shan has embraced his new role.
sentences.chinese: 姜山目前已欣然接受了自己的新角色。

sentences.english: Mercury and Saturn readily fit within the same binocular field.
sentences.chinese: 在同一個雙眼領域內和土星欣然合適的水星。

sentences.english: And here it sees you just want the first 24 elements and it gladly obliges .
sentences.chinese: 在這裏它見你只要24個元素，便欣然交差。

sentences.english: Gladly Baines takes her father's blood money.
sentences.chinese: 欣然林登貝恩以她父親的血錢。

sentences.english: Simon enthusiastically agreed to my suggestion.
sentences.chinese: 西蒙欣然同意了我的提議。
龐德先生是欣然同意的。

sentences.english: Everything seems to be awaken from sleep, opening his eyes drawlingly.
sentences.chinese: 一切都像剛睡醒的樣子，欣欣然張開了眼。

sentences.english: The novelist lapped up great praise from critics.
sentences.chinese: 小說家欣然接受了批評家們的高度讚揚。

sentences.english: But remember that return the favor when he or she needs your help.
sentences.chinese: 但記住他或她需要你幫忙時，你應該欣然相助。

sentences.english: British welcomed Kuwait’s declaration of independence in 1961.
sentences.chinese: 英國欣然接受了科威特在1961年獨立。

definition: to be pleased beyond one's expectations (idiom)/overjoyed at the turn of events
to burst with joy (idiom)/to be over the moon/to be elated
to have a smile on one's face
lit. seek but fail to get (idiom); fig. exactly what one’s been looking for
